message.body: Sofie I'm just about to leave target now, where are you?
Me and my roommate found 2 abandoned cats near our apartment and we're now feeding them and trying to find their home
Come come its so nice here
Sofie I got home. Let me know when you're home, it's late, I'm worrying about you
I an in a cab the trains stopped running. Thanks for asking
..... >_< you should have come with us! Oh i'm so sorry! Are you alone there? How about Kim?
I'm good I'm Home soooo tired
Good, I'm sooooo tired too! And I have to be in the parade all the morning, after that I have to do the Braille and the conference begins tomorrow evening >_< Go to bed! Good night!!
Good night! Keep me updated and document everything
